name: Cat Tag Fighter
description:
This game is a two player game, Player 1 will control the purple cat using the "a,w,s,d" keys and player two will control the monster by dragging it with the mouse. Player 1 wins if they catch Player 2 within the time limit. If Player 2 does not get caught when time runs out, Player 2 will win the game. 

Sources- Code based on example by Alec Juno Mcclure

timer code- by digital dragon

images from Akira Toriyama and Arc Systems
